column1: Art Institute of Chicago////There are a ton of wonderful exhibits
column2: and a lot to see. I loved the stained glass (I think it's Chigals stained glass exhibit)
column3: the china exhibit and the American Art section. Â They also have two gift shops available
column4: where you can purchase a lot of good stuff. The gift shops can be pricey
column5: but I found a few things here that I liked
